election_record.label: Ohio 1824 Governor

overview.note: The votes from Champaign County, Crawford County or Sandusky County were not listed in the returns published in the Ohio House Journal. Votes for those three counties were found in serveral newspapers.

There is some discrepancy between the totals listed in the House Journal for the candidates and their actual votes. The votes as given in the Ohio House Jounral were for Jeremiah Morrow: 39,526 and Allen Trimble: 37,108 and this is without the returns for Champaign, Crawford, and Sandusky counties, which were not included.
The actual county figures as published in the Ohio House Journal and including these three counties, which were missing, add up to the results as given above.

sub_unit.name: Adams
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 724 votes and Allen Trimble with 263 votes.
The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 268 votes.
The Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 724 votes.

sub_unit.name: Athens
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH), Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH), Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH), Western Star and Lebanon Gazette and Castigator (Ripley, OH) list Allen Trimble with 53 votes.

sub_unit.name: Butler
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Daily Intelligence and Advertiser, National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH) and Western Star and Lebanon Gazette list Jeremiah Morrow with 2046 votes.

sub_unit.name: Champaign
sub_unit.note: The votes from Champaign County are not included in the Official Certified Vote.

sub_unit.name: Clinton
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 248 votes.

sub_unit.name: Columbiana
sub_unit.note: The Abstract of Votes, Columbiana county appear to show Allen Trimble's township totals adding up to 2302, but the official vote reports Trimble's total as 2300.

sub_unit.name: Coshocton
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 624 votes and Allen Trimble with 532 votes.
The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette and Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 624 votes.
The Guernsey Times (Cambridge, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 524 votes and Allen Trimble with 532 votes.

sub_unit.name: Darke
sub_unit.note: Columbus Gazette (Columbus, OH), Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH), Guernsey Times (Cambridge, OH) and Western Star and Lebanon Gazette list Jeremiah Morrow with 330 votes and Allen Trimble with 143 votes.
The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 380 votes and Allen Trimble with 148 votes.

sub_unit.name: Fairfield
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 1029 votes.
Sandusky Clarion (Sandusky, OH), Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) and The Ohio Repository (Canton, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1317 votes and Allen Trimble with 1029 votes.
The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette, National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH) and Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1316 votes.

sub_unit.name: Fayette
sub_unit.note: The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette lists Jeremiah Morrow with 194 votes.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 835 votes.
The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 824 votes.
The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) and Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) list Allen Trimble with 844 votes.

sub_unit.name: Geauga
sub_unit.note: Painesville Telegraph (Painesville, OH) lists the township totals which report Jeremiah Morrow with 114 votes and Allen Trimble with 920 votes. However, these are not the official vote totals as listed in the Journal of the Ohio State Senate.

sub_unit.name: Hamilton
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 3353 votes.
The Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 3263 votes.

sub_unit.name: Highland
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 574 votes.

sub_unit.name: Jackson
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH), National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH), Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) and Castigator (Ripley, OH) list Allen Trimble with 403 votes.

sub_unit.name: Jefferson
sub_unit.note: The Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH) reverses the results and lists Allen Trimble with 1610 votes.

sub_unit.name: Lawrence
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 103 votes.

sub_unit.name: Licking
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH) and Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1151 votes.

sub_unit.name: Lorain
sub_unit.note: Cleaveland Herald (Cleveland, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 17 votes.

sub_unit.name: Madison
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 265 votes and Allen Trimble with 401 votes.
The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette lists Allen Trimble with 401 votes.
The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 400 votes.
The Guernsey Times (Cambridge, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 421 votes.

sub_unit.name: Meigs
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH), National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH) and Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) list Allen Trimble with 18 votes.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 1484 votes and Allen Trimble with 370 votes.

Sandusky Clarion (Sandusky, OH), National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH), Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH), Western Star and Lebanon Gazette and Castigator (Ripley, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1484 votes.

The Dayton Watchman or Farmer and Mechanics' Journal (Dayton, OH) and Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1484 votes but the township totals add up to 1464 votes.

sub_unit.name: Morgan
sub_unit.note: The American Friend and Marietta Gazette (Marietta, OH), Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH), National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH), Miami Republican and Dayton Advertiser (Dayton, OH), Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH), The Ohio Repository (Canton, OH), Castigator (Ripley, OH), Western Star and Lebanon Gazette, Clarion (Sandusky) and Columbus Gazette (Columbus, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 379 votes.
The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 374 votes.
Columbus Gazette (Columbus, OH), Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH), The Ohio Repository (Canton, OH) and Clarion (Sandusky) list Allen Trimble with 459 votes.
The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette lists Allen Trimble with 474 votes.

sub_unit.name: Perry
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH), National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH), Castigator (Ripley, OH), and Clarion (Sandusky) list Jeremiah Morrow with 262 votes.
The Perry Record (Somerset, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 262 votes, but has township totals that add up to 261 votes.
The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette lists Jeremiah Morrow with 255 votes and Allen Trimble with 1051 votes.
The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 225 votes and Allen Trimble with 2051 votes.

sub_unit.name: Pickaway
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 465 votes.

sub_unit.name: Pike
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 240 votes.
The National Republican and Ohio Political Register (Cincinnati, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 248 votes.

sub_unit.name: Preble
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 1020 votes.

sub_unit.name: Richland
sub_unit.note: The Western Reserve Chronicle (Warren, OH), The Ohio Repository (Canton, OH) and Clarion (Sandusky) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1393 votes.
The Castigator (Ripley, OH) and Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 1376 votes.
The Guernsey Times (Cambridge, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 1396 votes.

sub_unit.name: Ross
sub_unit.note: Sandusky Clarion (Sandusky, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 1166 votes and Allen Trimble with 1575 votes.

sub_unit.name: Sandusky
sub_unit.note: The votes from Sandusky County are not included in the Official Certified Vote.
The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 187 votes.

sub_unit.name: Shelby
sub_unit.note: Columbus Gazette (Columbus, OH), Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH), Guernsey Times (Cambridge, OH), Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH), Western Star and Lebanon Gazette and Clarion (Sandusky) list Jeremiah Morrow with 300 votes.
The Casigator (Ripley) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 280 votes.

sub_unit.name: Stark
sub_unit.note: Columbus Gazette (Columbus, OH), Ohio Monitor and Patron of Industry (Columbus, OH) and Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) list Jeremiah Morrow with 460 votes and Allen Trimble with 688 votes.
Sandusky Clarion (Sandusky, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 749 votes.
The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 823 votes.
The Ohio Repository (Canton, OH) lists the same results as the Official Certified Vote, but the township totals add up to 741 votes for Jeremiah Morrow and 924 votes for Allen Trimble.

sub_unit.name: Trumbull
sub_unit.note: The Official Certified Vote lists Jeremiah Morrow with 404 votes and Allen Trimble with 1138 votes, due to the rejection of the poll books of Youngstown and Weathersfield.

sub_unit.name: Weathersfield
sub_unit.note: The poll book from Weathersfield was rejected by the county clerk on account of it not being legally made out.

sub_unit.name: Youngstown
sub_unit.note: The poll book from Youngstown was rejected by the county clerk on account of it not being legally made out.

sub_unit.name: Tuscarawas
sub_unit.note: The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 458 votes.
The Western Star and Lebanon Gazette lists Jeremiah Morrow with 460 votes and Allen Trimble with 688 votes.

sub_unit.name: Warren
sub_unit.note: The Hamilton Intelligencer and Advertiser (Hamilton, OH) reverses the results for Jeremiah Morrow and Allen Trimble.
The Star and Gazette (Lebanon, OH) provides township totals but Allen Trimble's total adds up to 143 while his official total for the county is 144.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: Sandusky Clarion (Sandusky, OH) lists Jeremiah Morrow with 728 votes.
The Castigator (Ripley, OH) lists Allen Trimble with 218 votes.

sub_unit.name: Williams
sub_unit.note: County of Williams, Ohio lists Allen Trimble with 61 votes.
